snippet.title: Berserk NFT Card Game | Play to Earn
snippet.description:
Are You Ready to Enter the Arena?

Collect. Compete. Combat. Conquer.

Berserk is the ultimate strategic collectible card game set in the epic fantasy world of VulcanVerse. Immerse yourself in fast-paced PVP duels as you summon mighty creatures, cast explosive spells, and unleash the power of the Vulcanites. Build your deck, forge your legacy, and vanquish all who stand in your way.

4 Mystical Lands, 1 Epic Journey: CCG/TCG
144 NFT Cards: Collect | Trade | Sell | Rent
10 Factions & Endless Strategies
27+ Vulcanites: Your Battle Companions
30-Card Decks, 6 Rarities: Craft Your Legacy
30 Health, Every Point Counts
AI Duels to Global PvP: Your Skills, Your Way
Earn Lava, Level Up: Rewards Await
Uncover the lore of VulcanVerse
Join the Elite Community of VulcanVerse

A Universe of Powerful Cards Awaits
Berserk boasts a massive collectible card set featuring over 144 cards - 31 non-NFTs & 113 NFTs (purchasable/tradeable/rentable) based on rarity and the Deck Power Rating with unique creatures, spells, and artifacts, each belonging to 6 lands divided across 10 distinctive & inventive factions.

Dive into the battle, master your strategies, and become a legend in Berserk!

📱 Download Now:
Google Play Store: https://shorturl.at/KTlBp
Apple App Store: https://shorturl.at/RG8hq
PC Launcher: https://shorturl.at/8GMgW

🔗 Stay Connected with Us:
🌐 Official Website:  https://berserk.vulcanforged.com/
🐦 Twitter:  https://x.com/Berserk_Game
📘 Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/BerserkVF
📸 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/berserk_vulcanforged/
▶️ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@Berserk-VulcanForged
💬 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/ZyjTvFM
